original_text: When they arrived at the big rock in Gibeon, Amasa came to meet them. Joab was wearing his soldier's clothes. He had a long knife that was tied to his belt. As Joab went towards Amasa, the knife fell to the ground.
korean_text: 기브온 큰 바위 곁에 이르매 아마사가 맞으러 오니 그 때에 요압이 군복을 입고 띠를 띠고 칼집에 꽂은 칼을 허리에 맸는데 그가 나아갈 때에 칼이 빠져 떨어졌더라

sentences.original_text: When they arrived at the big rock in Gibeon,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 기브온의 큰 바위에 도착했을 때,

sentences.original_text: Joab was wearing his soldier's clothes.
that was tied to his belt.
the knife fell to the ground.
